comments.author: gaelcolas
comments.body:
`ModuleName` was a mandatory parameter in one of the preview, when Steve made this demo.

It's working as expected in PS7.1.2+ (and probably before that).

```PowerShell
Invoke-DscResource -Verbose -Name nxUser -Method get -Property @{UserName = 'smurf'; GroupId = 1001}
```

Pleas close this issue.

title: Invoke-DscResource not working as shown
